function_description: Using the description text editor for a card
initial_state: User is logged into the 4ga Boards web app and has access to a board with at least one card.
steps: Navigate to the board containing the card whose description needs editing.
Select the card by clicking on it to open the card details.
Locate the description text editor within the card details.
Enter or modify text in the description field using the text editor.
Utilize available text editing tools (e.g., bold, italic, bullet points) to format the description as needed.
Save the changes to the card's description.
expected_state: The card's description is updated and formatted according to the user's input, visible within the card details.
